page.title: 10Housing
page.content:
Tayport has a variety of housing One type of housing is the {cottage,}which is the oldest.They were lived in by the weavers and the fishers.Most of the cottages nowadays have been modernized.
The second oldest type of house is the {villa.}These were stone built in the last century and were lived in by sea captains and business men from Dundee.
The newest houses are the{semi_ {detached}and the{council blocks}of four to six{flats.}There are 618 Council houses in Tayport and a further 48 Council built houses are now privately owned.
